alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 22 at 2:22AM MST until December 23 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow possible at times. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches in the valleys below 6000 feet and 8 to 16 inches across the mountains and passes above 6000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph at times producing blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Stanley to Ketchum and the surrounding mountain ranges. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible at times.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
